comments:
Using the context menu for a xsl file, my options are to Open With > Text 
Editor, System Editor, In-Place Editor, and Default Editor.  I selected the In-
Place Editor and I got an error message that reads "Unable to create part:  ".  
I click OK and it opens to a grayed out editor that has a message at the 
top "An error has occurred when creating this editor."  Here are the errors 
that appeared in the consolelog:
